outputs.output_descr:
1. A participatory District Strategic Development Planning Methodology is prepared and piloted.
2. A legal and regulatory environment that supports institutionalization, implementation and replication of the participatory District Strategic Development Planning Methodology is developed and enabled.
3. Capacity of local civil society organizations (CSOs), citizens and local authorities to participate effectively in the local planning processes is enhanced.
4. Selected visible quick impact projects are implemented.

project_descr: The anticipated overall objective of the PRDP Project is to institute participatory planning and community development at the regional (i.e. governorate) level through strengthening the planning capacity for organizations and authorities at national, reg
